name: DiabeticPeripheralAngiopathy
title: Diabetic Peripheral Angiopathy
description: Documented diagnosis of Diabetic Peripheral Angiopathy (Business ID: Entry 2350319)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Diabetic Peripheral Angiopathy.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an documented diagnosis of diabetic peripheral angiopathy.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes GROUP codes for Diabetic Peripheral Angiopathy.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Diabetic Peripheral Angiopathy.)
